Index >  OnPostTransfer

OnPostTransfer

Description

This event is triggered when a page has been scanned and transferred.

Syntax

.RegisterEvent('OnPostTransfer',function(){...});

Remarks

This is where to check PendingXFERs, ImageLayoutDocumentNumber ImageLayoutFrameLeft, ImageLayoutFrameTop, ImageLayoutFrameRight, ImageLayoutFrameBottom, ImageLayoutPageNumber, ImageLayoutFrameNumber.

This is also the place to call CancelAllPendingTransfers().

See Also

OnPreAllTransfers
OnPreTransfer
OnPostAllTransfers

Example

DWObject.RegisterEvent('OnPostTransfer', function(){
    alert(DWObject.CurrentImageIndexInBuffer);
});
